articles.title: Fifa Women's World Cup: France lead Panama, Jamaica & Brazil goalless
articles.description: Follow live text updates as Jamaica face Brazil and Panama play France in the Group F deciders at the 2023 Women's World Cup.
articles.content:
If nothing else, Panama boss Ignacio Quintana wins the best dressed manager award tonight. Very dapper navy suit and jumper, with brown brogues.
Certainly beats Herve Renard's untucked white shirt.
